statements: SELECT * FROM new_media_recommendations;
SELECT user_id, media_id, rating FROM new_media_recommendations;
SELECT media_id, recommendation_score FROM new_media_recommendations WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT user_id, recommendation_score FROM new_media_recommendations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM new_media_recommendations GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM new_media_recommendations ORDER BY timestamp DESC, recommendation_score ASC
SELECT user_id, media_id, rating FROM new_media_recommendations WHERE rating > 3.5 ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT user_id, MAX(rating) AS max_rating FROM new_media_recommendations GROUP BY user_id
SELECT media_id, COUNT(*) AS total_recommendations FROM new_media_recommendations GROUP BY media_id ORDER BY total_recommendations DESC
SELECT user_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM new_media_recommendations GROUP BY user_id HAVING avg_rating > 4
SELECT * FROM new_media_content_recommendations;
SELECT id, media_title, genre FROM new_media_content_recommendations WHERE genre='Action';
SELECT media_title, genre, rating FROM new_media_content_recommendations ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT id, media_title, rating FROM new_media_content_recommendations WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT id, media_title FROM new_media_content_recommendations WHERE genre IN ('Comedy', 'Drama');
SELECT * FROM new_media_content_recommendations WHERE genre = 'action';
SELECT media_title, rating FROM new_media_content_recommendations WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT genre FROM new_media_content_recommendations ORDER BY genre ASC;
SELECT media_title, rating, genre FROM new_media_content_recommendations WHERE rating BETWEEN 3.0 AND 4.0 AND genre = 'comedy';
SELECT media_title, genre, rating FROM new_media_content_recommendations WHERE genre IN ('drama', 'thriller') ORDER BY genre, rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM recommendation_algorithm
SELECT media_title, user_id, recommendation_id FROM recommendation_algorithm WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT name, age FROM user_profile WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT media_title, media_type FROM media_content ORDER BY media_title DESC
SELECT user_id, recommendation_id FROM recommendation_algorithm WHERE recommendation_id > 100
SELECT * FROM media_content WHERE media_type = 'movie';
SELECT media_title, media_type FROM media_content ORDER BY media_id DESC;
SELECT distinct media_type FROM media_content WHERE media_type IN ('movie', 'tv show');
SELECT user_id, name, age, gender FROM user_profile WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT user_id, recommendation_id, media_title FROM recommendation_algorithm WHERE recommendation_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE subscription_type = 'premium';
SELECT title, language, release_date FROM movies ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, movie_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(movie_id) AS num_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY num_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE subscription_type = 'premium';
SELECT title, release_date FROM movies WHERE language = 'English' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE subscription_type = 'basic' AND username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT u.username, m.title, r.recommendation_score FROM users u JOIN recommendations r ON u.id = r.user_id JOIN movies m ON r.movie_id = m.id ORDER BY u.username ASC, r.recommendation_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM Users WHERE user_name = 'John';
SELECT media_title, media_genre FROM Media WHERE media_genre = 'Action' ORDER BY media_title DESC;
SELECT user_name, media_genre FROM Users JOIN Recommendations ON Users.user_id = Recommendations.user_id;
SELECT user_name, rating_value FROM Users JOIN Ratings ON Users.user_id = Ratings.user_id WHERE rating_value > 3;
SELECT * FROM Recommendations WHERE recommendation_id = 'c7d3bea2-97cc-4471-a3f4-2fa8e411a51b';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM Users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT media_type, media_genre FROM Media WHERE media_genre = 'Action' OR media_genre = 'Comedy' ORDER BY media_type ASC;
SELECT R.user_id, R.media_id, V.view_timestamp FROM Ratings R JOIN Views V ON R.user_id = V.user_id AND R.media_id = V.media_id;
SELECT U.user_id, U.user_name, R.rating_value FROM Users U LEFT JOIN Ratings R ON U.user_id = R.user_id WHERE R.rating_value > 3 ORDER BY U.user_id ASC;
